message.content:
cs.CC, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.DM. 

The paper deals with approximation of halfspaces, which is a topic in computational complexity theory and falls under the category of cs.CC (Computational Complexity). The paper also involves communication complexity, which is a topic in information theory and falls under the category of cs.IT (Information Theory). The construction of the "hardest" halfspace involves techniques from discrete mathematics and combinatorics, which are covered in cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics). Finally, the paper involves geometric concepts such as halfspaces, which are covered in cs.CG (Computational Geometry).
